tasks.label: Maven Clean Install
tasks.command: mvn clean install && if [ -f minebridge-bukkit/target/MineBridge-Bukkit-1.0.0.jar ]; then cp minebridge-bukkit/target/MineBridge-Bukkit-1.0.0.jar "/home/egehan/Test Server/1.8/plugins/"; fi && if [ -f minebridge-bungeecord/target/MineBridge-BungeeCord-1.0.0.jar ]; then cp minebridge-bungeecord/target/MineBridge-BungeeCord-1.0.0.jar "/home/egehan/Test Server/BungeeCord/plugins/"; fi
